Household
Basic explanation of words
Household
hÃ¹
A door, door: portal. window. Hushu is not a beetle. Closed at night.
Family: Hukou. Head of household. Views on the portal (also assign prejudices on the other side).
The accounting department refers to groups or individuals with business relationships on the account books: account. Open an account.
Door number: the door is the account.
name.

["Guangyun" Hou Guqie, Shangma, Xie. ]
The new glyph of "house 1". The new glyph of "æˆ¸1".
(1) Single door. Also refers to the portal in general.
(2) Cave.
(3) Households; people.
(4) Refers to a person or family engaged in a certain profession.
(5) Every household.
(6) Household registration.
(7) It is used to refer to an individual or group that has an account relationship in the account book.
(8) A general term for individuals or groups that have some kind of contacts.
(9) Family position.
(10) Quantifiers. Used to count the number of households.
(11) Prevent; block.
(12) Amount of alcohol.
(13) Same as "Hu". Be, draped.
(14) Through "æ¿©".
(15) Through "æ˜ˆ". Wencai appearance. See "Hu Bao".
(16) Last name. There are households in the Han Dynasty. See "Continued General History Â· Clan Brief Seven".
